org.robobrain.sdk.graphics
Class SimpleSprite

java.lang.Object
  org.robobrain.sdk.graphics.Renderable
      org.robobrain.sdk.graphics.SimpleSprite

public class SimpleSprite
extends Renderable

The simplest Renderable object. Draws a Texture to the screen. Note: The SimpleSprite's origin is at the center of it's bounding Rectangle.

Author:
James Johnson

Constructor Detail

SimpleSprite

public SimpleSprite(Texture texture)
Initializes the SimpleSprite

Parameters:
texture - The Texture to be drawn. All textures must be sized to a power of 2. (e.g. 32x32 pixels, 64x64 pixels, etc)
